name: Sour Music Kart
overview: Welcome to Sour Music Kart, a new & personalized Super Mario Kart hack! Sour Music Kart is a comprehensive hack for the original game! Race as 8 new characters, each with their own quirks and perks, across multiple new locations! New content includes: Don’t know who the new characters are, what items are, or where are they racing? Fear not! Included with the hack is a custom made manual designed & inspired by the original one which should help you get started! • 8 new characters. • 8 new Backgrounds, each representing the new racers. • Brand new music for each theme, title, credits, etc.; as well as each racer having it’s new victory tune! • 20 brand-new new tracks, with a Super Mario Kart feel emphasis. • 4 custom made battle tracks! Enjoy new ways to battle your friends! • Edited miscellaneous which includes (but not limited to): menus, character select, obstacles, victory screens, updated title screen demos, etc.
